Name: Planet Barren Objective
About the game: You were a space explorer employed by the emperor to research the uncharted regions of the empire. Sadly while orbiting a seemingly barren planet, you are ambushed. Before long you find yourself landed and trapped in this planet. You have to escape here but you no longer have your high tech spaceship. You mush defend yourself, extract, explore and build your way out. Friends and foes are everywhere as well as anomalies to explore and dangers to evade. Build You can build solar panels, turrets, computers, miners, habitats and much more. This is your only hope for ever achieving your goals. With a computer you will be able to unlock many more buildings for many different purposes. Fight Using your fusion glove you can match the hordes of enemies coming for you. Don't forget to upgrade your skills on a computer to gain new powers and increase your chance of survival. You have turrets, allies and more to help your situation. Explore Above Build a space drone launcher and launch a drone to the space. Using a control room build, you can upgrade and control this drone in orbit. With encounters and job missions, there will be much to explore in space. Explore Below Underground of this planets hides it's own secrets and dangers. You can build a drill machine and provide resources to make your way below the surface. Beware that you fusion glove is of no use here. You will have to survive with melee combat and abilities provided exclusive to this map. Escape When you are well defended and resource rich enough, you can build a rocket, a stacker and a booster to create your means of escape. Fight off the enemies trying to bring you back. It may be small chance but it is your only chance to ever return to the civilization.
